name: Loutzavia (Pty) Ltd
about: Loutzavia, launched in 2004 at Wonderboom National Airport, is a leading aviation group in South Africa, dedicated to safety and excellence in all aspects of aviation. Founded by Jannie Loutzis and his wife Maria, the company offers comprehensive services including flight training from PPL to ATPL, air charters, aircraft sales, hangarage, and aircraft management. As one of the largest and most trusted flight schools in South Africa, Loutzavia is committed to providing world-class service, driven by a passion for flying and a commitment to the highest safety standards. With decades of experience and a team of experienced instructors, Loutzavia ensures an outstanding aviation experience for all its clients.
